using Tomlyn;

public class AppConfig
{
    public string Title { get; set; } = "";
    public ServerConfig Server { get; set; } = new();
    public DatabaseConfig Database { get; set; } = new();
}

public class ServerConfig
{
    public string Host { get; set; } = "localhost";
    public int Port { get; set; } = 8080;
    public bool SslEnabled { get; set; }
}

public class DatabaseConfig
{
    public string Server { get; set; } = "";
    public int Port { get; set; }
    public DbCredentials Credentials { get; set; } = new();
}

public class DbCredentials
{
    public string Username { get; set; } = "";
    public string Password { get; set; } = "";
}

var config = Toml.ToObject<AppConfig>(toml);

using Tomlyn;
using System.IO;

/// <summary>
/// TOML é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è¯»å†™å·¥å…·ç±»
/// </summary>
public static class TomlConfigHelper
{
    /// <summary>
    /// ä»æ–‡ä»¶åŠ è½½ TOML é…ç½®ï¼ˆå¼ºç±»å‹ï¼‰
    /// </summary>
    public static T Load<T>(string filePath) where T : new()
    {
        if (!File.Exists(filePath))
            throw new FileNotFoundException($"TOML é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨: {filePath}");

        var content = File.ReadAllText(filePath);
        return Toml.ToObject<T>(content);
    }

    /// <summary>
    /// ä¿å­˜é…ç½®å¯¹è±¡åˆ° TOML æ–‡ä»¶
    /// </summary>
    public static void Save<T>(string filePath, T config)
    {
        var content = Toml.FromObject(config);
        Directory.CreateDirectory(Path.GetDirectoryName(filePath) ?? ".");
        File.WriteAllText(filePath, content);
    }
}
